Config.Name: Port 1
Config.Description: Container Port: 5222

Config.Name: Port 2
Config.Description: Container Port: 5347

Config.Name: Port 3
Config.Description: Container Port: 5280

Config.Name: AppData Config Path
Config.Description: Container Path: /config

Config.Name: AUTH_TYPE
Config.Description: Select authentication type (internal, jwt or ldap)

Config.Name: ENABLE_AUTH
Config.Description: Enable authentication

Config.Name: ENABLE_GUESTS
Config.Description: Enable guest access

Config.Name: GLOBAL_MODULES
Config.Description: Custom prosody modules to load in global configuration (comma separated)

Config.Name: GLOBAL_CONFIG
Config.Description: Custom configuration string with escaped newlines

Config.Name: LDAP_URL
Config.Description: URL for ldap connection

Config.Name: LDAP_BASE
Config.Description: LDAP base DN. Can be empty.

Config.Name: LDAP_BINDDN
Config.Description: LDAP user DN. Do not specify this parameter for the anonymous bind.

Config.Name: LDAP_BINDPW
Config.Description: LDAP user password. Do not specify this parameter for the anonymous bind.

Config.Name: LDAP_FILTER
Config.Description: LDAP filter.

Config.Name: LDAP_AUTH_METHOD
Config.Description: LDAP authentication method.

Config.Name: LDAP_VERSION
Config.Description: LDAP protocol version

Config.Name: LDAP_USE_TLS
Config.Description: Enable LDAP TLS

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_CIPHERS
Config.Description: Set TLS ciphers list to allow

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_CHECK_PEER
Config.Description: Require and verify LDAP server certificate

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_CACERT_FILE
Config.Description: Path to CA cert file. Used when server certificate verification is enabled

Config.Name: LDAP_TLS_CACERT_DIR
Config.Description: Path to CA certs directory. Used when server certificate verification is enabled.

Config.Name: LDAP_START_TLS
Config.Description: Enable START_TLS, requires LDAPv3, URL must be ldap:// not ldaps://

Config.Name: XMPP_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Internal XMPP domain

Config.Name: XMPP_AUTH_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Internal XMPP domain for authenticated services

Config.Name: XMPP_GUEST_DOMAIN
Config.Description: XMPP domain for unauthenticated users

Config.Name: XMPP_MUC_DOMAIN
Config.Description: XMPP domain for the MUC

Config.Name: XMPP_INTERNAL_MUC_DOMAIN
Config.Description: XMPP domain for the internal MUC

Config.Name: XMPP_MODULES
Config.Description: Custom Prosody modules for XMPP_DOMAIN (comma separated)

Config.Name: XMPP_MUC_MODULES
Config.Description: Custom Prosody modules for MUC component (comma separated)

Config.Name: XMPP_INTERNAL_MUC_MODULES
Config.Description: Custom Prosody modules for internal MUC component (comma separated)

Config.Name: XMPP_RECORDER_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Domain for the jibri recorder

Config.Name: JICOFO_COMPONENT_SECRET
Config.Description: XMPP component password for Jicofo

Config.Name: JICOFO_AUTH_USER
Config.Description: XMPP user for Jicofo client connections

Config.Name: JICOFO_AUTH_PASSWORD
Config.Description: XMPP password for Jicofo client connections

Config.Name: JVB_AUTH_USER
Config.Description: XMPP user for JVB MUC client connections

Config.Name: JVB_AUTH_PASSWORD
Config.Description: XMPP password for JVB MUC client connections

Config.Name: JIGASI_XMPP_USER
Config.Description: XMPP user for Jigasi MUC client connections

Config.Name: JIGASI_XMPP_PASSWORD
Config.Description: XMPP password for Jigasi MUC client connections

Config.Name: JIBRI_XMPP_USER
Config.Description: Internal user for Jibri client connections.

Config.Name: JIBRI_XMPP_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Internal password for Jibri client connections.

Config.Name: JIBRI_RECORDER_USER
Config.Description: Internal recorder user for Jibri client connections

Config.Name: JIBRI_RECORDER_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Internal recorder password for Jibri client connections

Config.Name: JWT_APP_ID
Config.Description: Application identifier

Config.Name: JWT_APP_SECRET
Config.Description: Application secret known only to your token

Config.Name: JWT_ACCEPTED_ISSUERS
Config.Description: (Optional) Set asap_accepted_issuers as a comma separated list

Config.Name: JWT_ACCEPTED_AUDIENCES
Config.Description: (Optional) Set asap_accepted_audiences as a comma separated list

Config.Name: JWT_ASAP_KEYSERVER
Config.Description: (Optional) Set asap_keyserver to a url where public keys can be found

Config.Name: JWT_ALLOW_EMPTY
Config.Description: (Optional) Allow anonymous users with no JWT while validating JWTs when provided

Config.Name: JWT_AUTH_TYPE
Config.Description: (Optional) Controls which module is used for processing incoming JWTs

Config.Name: JWT_TOKEN_AUTH_MODULE
Config.Description: (Optional) Controls which module is used for validating JWTs

Config.Name: LOG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Controls which logs are output from prosody and associated modules
